reviewText: Nice relaxing DVD.  Bought as a gift.
Exceptional in everyway. Good definition and beautiful scenes, Lots of variety. Very relaxing. Great Value. Definitely a keeper. Strongly recommend.
this dvd on waterfalls is great, enjoyed it. thank you. very fast shipping, I liked the way it shows the different waterfalls in the national parks

While the video quality is impressive, the content does not include the most beautiful waterfalls within the world.

Thus, it is incomplete.

It needs to include video of Angel Falls, Iguazu Falls, Victoria Falls and other world class waterfalls.
My sister ordered this for my son for christmas. He loves waterfalls and absolutely loves this video. The music is soothing and the waterfalls are beautiful.
No distinct tracks, no way to repeat loop on a specific scene. Waste of money and I would not recommend
